title: Bitcoin Price History Schema
description: Schema for daily Bitcoin price history data including price, trading volume and price changes

Price.description: Closing price of Bitcoin in USD, formatted with thousands separator

Open.description: Opening price of Bitcoin in USD, formatted with thousands separator

High.description: Highest price of Bitcoin in USD during the day, formatted with thousands separator

Low.description: Lowest price of Bitcoin in USD during the day, formatted with thousands separator

Vol..description: Trading volume with K/M/B suffix for thousands/millions/billions

Change %.description: Daily price change percentage, formatted with % symbol
